rationale: 'highly contagious virus' uses 'highly contagious' as a technical term preceding the virus name.
statement_text: The U.S. Department of Agriculture said all 1.35 million chickens on the farm in Ohio’s Union County will be slaughtered to help limit the spread of the highly contagious virus after a case was confirmed in the flock this week.

rationale: The verb 'slaughtered' is listed as a high-potency verb.
